Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications) hands over a prize to Mr. Syed Abdul Aleem
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students and faculty members at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. P. Subbarayan hands over a prize to Mr. Syed Abdul Aleem (The Student Secretary). Also visible in the background is Mr. Anand Singh Bawa (founding editor of Campastimes, an IIT studentsâ€™ publication) in the background
